mc.name: Mogg Bombers
mc.oracleText: When another creature comes into play, sacrifice Mogg Bombers. If you do, it deals 3 damage to target player.
mc.printedText: If any other creature comes into play, sacrifice Mogg Bombers and it deals 3 damage to target player.
mc.flavorText: Behind every great mogg bomber is another mogg with a shovel and a basket.

mc.name: Mogg Flunkies
mc.oracleText: Mogg Flunkies can't attack or block alone.
mc.printedText: Mogg Flunkies cannot attack or block during a turn in which no other creature you control attacks or blocks.
mc.flavorText: They'll attack whatever's in front of them--as long as you tell them where that is.

mc.name: Mob Justice
mc.oracleText: Mob Justice deals damage to target player equal to the number of creatures you control.
mc.printedText: Mob Justice deals 1 damage to target player for each creature you control.
mc.flavorText: A single stone can start an avalanche.

mc.name: Silver Wyvern
mc.oracleText:
Flying
{U}: Change the target of target spell or ability with a single target if that target is Silver Wyvern. The new target must be a creature.
mc.printedText:
Flying
{U}: Target spell or ability, which targets only Silver Wyvern, targets another creature of your choice instead. Play this ability as an interrupt.

mc.name: Dream Halls
mc.oracleText: Rather than pay the mana cost for a spell, its controller may discard a card that shares a color with that spell.
mc.printedText: Instead of paying the casting cost for a spell of any color, its caster may choose and discard a card that shares at least one color with that spell. If the spell has {X} in its casting cost, X is 0.
mc.flavorText: Within without.

mc.name: Crovax the Cursed
mc.oracleText:
Crovax the Cursed comes into play with four +1/+1 counters on it.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice a creature. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Crovax. If you don't, remove a +1/+1 counter from Crovax.
{B}: Crovax gains flying until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Crovax the Cursed counts as a Vampire.
Crovax comes into play with four +1/+1 counters on it.
During your upkeep, sacrifice a creature and put a +1/+1 counter on Crovax, or remove a +1/+1 counter from Crovax.
{B}: Crovax gains flying until end of turn.

mc.name: Mogg Infestation
mc.oracleText: Destroy all creatures target player controls. For each creature put into a graveyard this way, put two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens into play under that player's control.
mc.printedText: Destroy all creatures target player controls. For each creature put into any graveyard in this way, put two Goblin tokens into play under that player's control. Treat these tokens as 1/1 red creatures.

mc.name: Acidic Sliver
mc.oracleText: All Slivers have "{2}, Sacrifice this permanent: This permanent deals 2 damage to target creature or player."
mc.printedText: Each Sliver gains "{2}, Sacrifice this creature: This creature deals 2 damage to target creature or player."
mc.flavorText: The first sliver burst against the cave wall, and others piled in behind to deepen the new tunnel.

mc.name: Amok
mc.oracleText: {1}, Discard a card at random: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
mc.printedText: {1}, Discard a card at random: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
mc.flavorText: Crovax's rage was horrifying. Within moments only blood and shreds of flesh remained of the shapeshifter.

mc.name: Awakening
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of each upkeep, all players untap all creatures and lands they control.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, untap all creatures and lands.
mc.flavorText:
"There are times when destiny calls forth a people and demands an action. Now is the time. We are the people. This is our action. Charge"
--Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

mc.name: Bandage
mc.oracleText:
Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
Draw a card.
mc.printedText:
Prevent 1 damage to any creature or player.
Draw a card.
mc.flavorText: Takara shook with guilt. She knew the last image her father had seen was her sword flashing toward him.

mc.name: Bottomless Pit
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player discards a card at random.
mc.printedText: During each player's upkeep, that player discards a card at random.
mc.flavorText:
"I'm sure it came with the place. I don't think you build one on purpose."
--Gerrard

mc.name: Brush with Death
mc.oracleText:
Buyback {2}{B}{B} (You may pay an additional {2}{B}{B} as you play this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Target opponent loses 2 life. You gain 2 life.
mc.printedText:
Buyback {2}{B}{B} (You may pay an additional {2}{B}{B} when you play this spell. If you do, put it into your hand instead of your graveyard as part of the spell's effect.)
Target opponent loses 2 life. You gain 2 life.

mc.name: Bullwhip
mc.oracleText: {2}, {T}: Bullwhip deals 1 damage to target creature. That creature attacks this turn if able.
mc.printedText: {2}, {T}: Bullwhip deals 1 damage to target creature. That creature attacks this turn if able.
mc.flavorText:
"Pain is a crude way to enforce obedience, but it is cheap and plentiful."
--Volrath

mc.name: Burgeoning
mc.oracleText: Whenever an opponent plays a land, you may put a land card from your hand into play.
mc.printedText: Whenever any opponent plays a land, you may choose a land card from your hand and put it into play.
mc.flavorText:
"The plants said, --'We will fight the stone with root and stem and seed. We are patient. We will win.'"
--Skyshroud myth of the forest

mc.name: Calming Licid
mc.oracleText:
{W}, {T}: Calming Licid loses this ability and becomes an Aura enchantment with enchant creature. Attach it to target creature. You may pay {W} to end this effect.
Enchanted creature can't attack.
mc.printedText: {W}, {T}: Calming Licid loses this ability and becomes a creature enchantment that reads "Enchanted creature cannot attack" instead of a creature. Move Calming Licid onto target creature. You may pay {W} to end this effect.

mc.name: Cannibalize
mc.oracleText: Choose a player and two target creatures that player controls. You remove one from the game and put two +1/+1 counters on the other.
mc.printedText: Choose two target creatures controlled by any one player. Remove one of those creatures from the game and put two +1/+1 counters on the other.
mc.flavorText: "Mine."

mc.name: Mogg Maniac
mc.oracleText: Whenever Mogg Maniac is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to target opponent.
mc.printedText: Whenever Mogg Maniac is dealt damage, it deals an equal amount of damage to target opponent.
mc.flavorText: Stand clear if he gets an itch.

mc.name: Change of Heart
mc.oracleText:
Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you play this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Target creature can't attack this turn.
mc.printedText:
Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} when you play this spell. If you do, put it into your hand instead of your graveyard as part of the spell's effect.)
Target creature cannot attack this turn.

mc.name: Cloud Spirit
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Cloud Spirit can block only creatures with flying.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Cloud Spirit can block only creatures with flying.
mc.flavorText:
Clouds are the soil, dreams are the crop.
--Kor saying

mc.name: Constant Mists
mc.oracleText:
Buyback-Sacrifice a land. (You may sacrifice a land in addition to any other costs as you play this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
mc.printedText:
Buyback--Sacrifice a land (You may sacrifice a land in addition to any other costs when you play this spell. If you do, put Constant Mists into your hand instead of your graveyard as part of the spell's effect.)
Creatures deal no combat damage this turn.

mc.name: Ensnaring Bridge
mc.oracleText: Creatures with power greater than the number of cards in your hand can't attack.
mc.printedText: Each creature with power greater than the number of cards in your hand cannot attack.
mc.flavorText:
"I expected a fight, but I didn't expect it from the building itself."
--Gerrard

mc.name: Contemplation
mc.oracleText: Whenever you play a spell, you gain 1 life.
mc.printedText: Whenever you successfully cast a spell, gain 1 life.
mc.flavorText:
"How fascinating it is to watch the machinations of one's own mind play themselves out."
--Volrath

mc.name: Contempt
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature attacks, return it and Contempt to their owners' hands at end of combat.
mc.printedText: If enchanted creature attacks, return that creature and Contempt to owner's hand at end of combat.
mc.flavorText:
"Predictable little man. In all these years you taught me so much yet learned so little."
--Volrath, to Starke

mc.name: Conviction
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+3.
{W}: Return Conviction to its owner's hand.
mc.printedText:
Enchanted creature gets +1/+3.
{W}: Return Conviction to owner's hand.
mc.flavorText: It was not the minotaur's shoulders but his soul that bore the heaviest weight.

mc.name: Corrupting Licid
mc.oracleText:
{B}, {T}: Corrupting Licid loses this ability and becomes an Aura enchantment with enchant creature. Attach it to target creature. You may pay {B} to end this effect.
Enchanted creature has fear.
mc.printedText: {B}, {T}: Corrupting Licid loses this ability and becomes a creature enchantment that reads "Enchanted creature cannot be blocked except by artifact creatures and black creatures" instead of a creature. Move Corrupting Licid onto target creature. You may pay {B} to end this effect.

mc.name: Convulsing Licid
mc.oracleText:
{R}, {T}: Convulsing Licid loses this ability and becomes an Aura enchantment with enchant creature. Attach it to target creature. You may pay {R} to end this effect.
Enchanted creature can't block.
mc.printedText: {R}, {T}: Convulsing Licid loses this ability and becomes a creature enchantment that reads "Enchanted creature cannot block" instead of a creature. Move Convulsing Licid onto target creature. You may pay {R} to end this effect.

mc.name: Craven Giant
mc.oracleText: Craven Giant can't block.
mc.printedText: Craven Giant cannot block.
mc.flavorText:
What is high as a mountain and low as a snake?
--Dal riddle

mc.name: Crossbow Ambush
mc.oracleText: Creatures you control gain reach until end of turn. (They can block creatures with flying.)
mc.printedText: All creatures you control can block creatures with flying until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
There is no drake that flies faster than a crossbow bolt.
--Vec saying

mc.name: Crystalline Sliver
mc.oracleText: All Slivers have shroud. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.)
mc.printedText: Slivers cannot be the target of spells or abilities.
mc.flavorText: Bred as living shields, these slivers have proven unruly--they know they cannot be caught.

mc.name: Dauthi Trapper
mc.oracleText: {T}: Target creature gains shadow until end of turn. (It can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
mc.printedText: {T}: Target creature gains shadow until end of turn. (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
mc.flavorText: Merfolk tell their young of Dandan, humans of Rag Man. Dal tell tales of the Dauthi, and they are far worse.

mc.name: Grave Pact
mc.oracleText: Whenever a creature you control is put into a graveyard from play, each other player sacrifices a creature.
mc.printedText: Whenever any creature you control is put into any graveyard, each other player sacrifices a creature.
mc.flavorText:
"The bonds of loyalty can tie one to the grave."
--Crovax

mc.name: Death Stroke
mc.oracleText: Destroy target tapped creature.
mc.printedText: Destroy target tapped creature.
mc.flavorText: For a sharp second, Selenia froze, and Crovax's blade found home. As the angel shattered like glass, Crovax felt his mind collapse--the curse had been fulfilled.

mc.name: Scapegoat
mc.oracleText:
As an additional cost to play Scapegoat, sacrifice a creature.
Return any number of target creatures you control to their owner's hand.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice a creature: Return any number of target creatures you control to owner's hand.
mc.flavorText: "Enjoy your deception, Vuel," Gerrard said as Volrath's features melted from the dead shapeshifter. "I'll count this one as practice."

mc.name: Dream Prowler
mc.oracleText: Dream Prowler is unblockable as long as it's attacking alone.
mc.printedText: Dream Prowler is unblockable as long as no other creatures are attacking.
mc.flavorText:
"To think that some find sleep a restful state."
--Volrath

mc.name: Duct Crawler
mc.oracleText: {1}{R}: Target creature can't block Duct Crawler this turn.
mc.printedText: {1}{R}: Target creature cannot block Duct Crawler this turn.
mc.flavorText:
"The mountain's ducts will be like organ pipes, amplifying the glorious roar of the dying."
--Stronghold architect, journal

mc.name: Dungeon Shade
mc.oracleText:
Flying
{B}: Dungeon Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Flying
{B}: Dungeon Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: A sickness stirs in its eyes, a nightmare born in darkened wails.

mc.name: Shock
mc.oracleText: Shock deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText: Shock deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
mc.flavorText:
Lightning tethers souls to the world.
--Kor saying

mc.name: Elven Rite
mc.oracleText: Distribute two +1/+1 counters among one or two target creatures.
mc.printedText: Put two +1/+1 counters, distributed any way you choose, on any number of target creatures.
mc.flavorText: As the bough stretches, so shall you grow. As the roots spread, so shall you thrive.

mc.name: Endangered Armodon
mc.oracleText: When you control a creature with toughness 2 or less, sacrifice Endangered Armodon.
mc.printedText: If you control any creature with toughness 2 or less, sacrifice Endangered Armodon.
mc.flavorText: These are its last days. Its doom to be remembered only until the hunters hunger again.

mc.name: Evacuation
mc.oracleText: Return all creatures to their owners' hands.
mc.printedText: Return all creatures to owners' hands.
mc.flavorText: The first step of every exodus is from the blood and the fire onto the trail.

mc.name: Fanning the Flames
mc.oracleText:
Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you play this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Fanning the Flames deals X damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText:
Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} when you play this spell. If you do, put it into your hand instead of your graveyard as part of the spell's effect.)
Fanning the Flames deals X damage to target creature or player.

mc.name: Primal Rage
mc.oracleText: Creatures you control have trample. (If a creature you control would deal enough combat damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it deal the rest of its damage to defending player.)
mc.printedText: All creatures you control gain trample.
mc.flavorText: "Charge" A great cry went out, and countless elves and Vec soldiers charged up the mountain. Their fury and passion hid the fact that they were horribly outnumbered.

mc.name: Flame Wave
mc.oracleText: Flame Wave deals 4 damage to target player and each creature he or she controls.
mc.printedText: Flame Wave deals 4 damage to target player and each creature he or she controls.
mc.flavorText:
"I hear the roaring of a wave whose waters are red and whose mists are black."
--Oracle en-Vec

mc.name: Fling
mc.oracleText:
As an additional cost to play Fling, sacrifice a creature.

Fling deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to target creature or player.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice a creature: Fling deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to target creature or player.
mc.flavorText: It's raining rats and moggs.

mc.name: Flowstone Blade
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
{R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"Remember the fable of the elf who came upon a cave of gold. In trying to free the largest piece, she was crushed by its weight."
--Karn, silver golem

mc.name: Flowstone Hellion
mc.oracleText:
Haste
{0}: Flowstone Hellion gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Flowstone Hellion is unaffected by summoning sickness.
{0}: Flowstone Hellion gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Volrath leaves no stone untrained.

mc.name: Flowstone Mauler
mc.oracleText:
Trample
{R}: Flowstone Mauler gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Trample
{R}: Flowstone Mauler gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Once these horrifying creatures were perfected, there was no need for armodons.

mc.name: Shard Phoenix
mc.oracleText:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.)
Sacrifice Shard Phoenix: Shard Phoenix deals 2 damage to each creature without flying.
{R}{R}{R}: Return Shard Phoenix from your graveyard to your hand. Play this ability only during your upkeep.
mc.printedText:
Flying
{R}{R}{R}: Put Shard Phoenix into your hand. Use this ability only if Shard Phoenix is in your graveyard and only during your upkeep.
Sacrifice Shard Phoenix: Shard Phoenix deals 2 damage to each creature without flying.

mc.name: Flowstone Shambler
mc.oracleText: {R}: Flowstone Shambler gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {R}: Flowstone Shambler gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Flowstone troops are notoriously difficult to keep in formation.

mc.name: Foul Imp
mc.oracleText:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.)
When Foul Imp comes into play, you lose 2 life.
mc.printedText:
Flying
When Foul Imp comes into play, lose 2 life.
mc.flavorText: The imp, unaware of its own odor, paused to catch its breath . . . and promptly died.

mc.name: Furnace Spirit
mc.oracleText:
Haste
{R}: Furnace Spirit gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Furnace Spirit is unaffected by summoning sickness.
{R}: Furnace Spirit gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: If it can survive the Furnace, you don't want it near you.

mc.name: Gliding Licid
mc.oracleText:
{U}, {T}: Gliding Licid loses this ability and becomes an Aura enchantment with enchant creature. Attach it to target creature. You may pay {U} to end this effect.
Enchanted creature has flying.
mc.printedText: {U}, {T}: Gliding Licid loses this ability and becomes a creature enchantment that reads "Enchanted creature gains flying" instead of a creature. Move Gliding Licid onto target creature. You may pay {U} to end this effect.

mc.name: Hammerhead Shark
mc.oracleText: Hammerhead Shark can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
mc.printedText: Hammerhead Shark cannot attack unless defending player controls any islands.
mc.flavorText: Cross the eyes of a hammerhead and you'll dot its teeth.

mc.name: Heartstone
mc.oracleText: Creatures' activated abilities cost {1} less to play. If this would make an ability cost 0 or less mana to play, it costs {1}, plus any nonmana costs.
mc.printedText: The cost of each creature ability requiring an activation cost is reduced by {1}. This cannot reduce an ability's generic mana cost to less then {1}.
mc.flavorText:
"Finding a true heartstone is even harder than finding a true heart."
--Hanna

mc.name: Heat of Battle
mc.oracleText: Whenever a creature blocks, Heat of Battle deals 1 damage to that creature's controller.
mc.printedText: Whenever any creature blocks, Heat of Battle deals 1 damage to that creature's controller.
mc.flavorText: "Takara, it's me" shouted Starke. It was no use--she obeyed Volrath.

mc.name: Hermit Druid
mc.oracleText: {G}, {T}: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a basic land card. Put that card into your hand and all other cards revealed this way into your graveyard.
mc.printedText: {G}, {T}: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a basic land card. Put that card into your hand and put all other revealed cards into your graveyard.
mc.flavorText: Seeking the company of plants ensures that your wits will go to seed.

mc.name: Hesitation
mc.oracleText: When a spell is played, sacrifice Hesitation. If you do, counter that spell.
mc.printedText: If any spell is played, counter that spell and sacrifice Hesitation.
mc.flavorText: Gerrard hesitated, looking up at the enemy ship. The future hesitated with him, changed forever by the pause.

mc.name: Hibernation Sliver
mc.oracleText: All Slivers have "Pay 2 life: Return this permanent to its owner's hand."
mc.printedText: Each Sliver gains "Pay 2 life: Return this creature to owner's hand."
mc.flavorText: Mogglings have been known to play ball with hibernating slivers, completely unaware of their true nature.

mc.name: Hidden Retreat
mc.oracleText: Put a card from your hand on top of your library: Prevent all damage that would be dealt by target instant or sorcery spell this turn.
mc.printedText: Choose a card in your hand and put it on top of your library: Prevent all damage from an instant or sorcery. (Treat further damage from that source normally.)
mc.flavorText: After an hour in the hidey-hole, Squee seriously pondered the advantages of danger over boredom.

mc.name: Honor Guard
mc.oracleText: {W}: Honor Guard gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {W}: Honor Guard gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"It is not a choice I make, to have this guard. It is the choice of my people, and my duty to them."
--Oracle en-Vec

mc.name: Horn of Greed
mc.oracleText: Whenever a player plays a land, that player draws a card.
mc.printedText: Whenever any player plays a land, that player draws a card.
mc.flavorText:
"Rath grows, and I am nourished."
--Volrath

mc.name: Hornet Cannon
mc.oracleText: {3}, {T}: Put a 1/1 Insect artifact creature token with flying and haste named Hornet into play. Destroy that creature at end of turn.
mc.printedText: {3}, {T}: Put a Hornet token into play. Treat this token as a 1/1 artifact creature with flying that is unaffected by summoning sickness. At end of turn, destroy the token.

mc.name: Intruder Alarm
mc.oracleText:
Creatures don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.
Whenever a creature comes into play, untap all creatures.
mc.printedText:
Creatures do not untap during their controllers' untap phases.
Whenever any creature comes into play, untap all creatures.
mc.flavorText: Mirri was startled by Volrath's apparition--it had no scent.

mc.name: Invasion Plans
mc.oracleText:
All creatures block each turn if able.

Instead of the defending player, the attacking player chooses how each creature blocks.
mc.printedText:
Each creature blocks whenever able.
Attacking player chooses how each creature blocks. (All blocking assignments must still be legal.)
mc.flavorText: Gerrard studied the globe as Mirri kept watch. Suddenly, his eyes widened. "This is Dominaria"

mc.name: Jinxed Ring
mc.oracleText:
Whenever a nontoken permanent is put into your graveyard from play, Jinxed Ring deals 1 damage to you.
Sacrifice a creature: Target opponent gains control of Jinxed Ring. (This effect doesn't end at end of turn.)
mc.printedText:
Whenever any card is put into your graveyard from play, Jinxed Ring deals 1 damage to you.
Sacrifice a creature: Target opponent gains control of Jinxed Ring permanently

mc.name: Lab Rats
mc.oracleText:
Buyback {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you play this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Put a 1/1 black Rat creature token into play.
mc.printedText:
Buyback {4} (You may pay an additional {4} when you play this spell. If you do, put it into your hand instead of your graveyard as part of the spell's effect.)
Put a Rat token into play. Treat this token as a 1/1 black creature.

mc.name: Lancers en-Kor
mc.oracleText:
Trample
{0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Lancers en-Kor this turn is dealt to target creature you control instead.
mc.printedText:
Trample
{0}: Redirect 1 damage from Lancers en-Kor to a creature you control.
mc.flavorText: Nearly all sets of Kor twins are trained as lancers.

mc.name: Leap
mc.oracleText:
Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

Draw a card.
mc.printedText:
Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
Draw a card.
mc.flavorText: Mirri leapt quickly and silently. The guard died likewise.

mc.name: Lowland Basilisk
mc.oracleText: Whenever Lowland Basilisk deals damage to a creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.
mc.printedText: Whenever Lowland Basilisk damages any creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.
mc.flavorText: Unlike their cousins, Rathi basilisks turn their victims into puddles of flowstone.

mc.name: Mana Leak
mc.oracleText: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.
mc.printedText: Counter target spell unless its caster pays an additional {3}.
mc.flavorText:
"The fatal flaw in every plan is the assumption that you know more than your enemy."
--Volrath

mc.name: Mask of the Mimic
mc.oracleText:
As an additional cost to play Mask of the Mimic, sacrifice a creature.

Search your library for a card with the same name as target nontoken creature and put that card into play. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice a creature: Search your library for any copy of target creature card and put it into play. Shuffle your library afterwards.

mc.name: Megrim
mc.oracleText: Whenever an opponent discards a card, Megrim deals 2 damage to that player.
mc.printedText: Whenever any opponent discards a card, Megrim deals 2 damage to him or her.
mc.flavorText: "You can run from your pain," explained Gerrard to Crovax, "but take it from experience: you will tire before it does."

mc.name: Mind Games
mc.oracleText:
Buyback {2}{U} (You may pay an additional {2}{U} as you play this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Tap target artifact, creature, or land.
mc.printedText:
Buyback {2}{U} (You may pay an additional {2}{U} when you play this spell. If you do, put it into your hand instead of your graveyard as part of the spell's effect.)
Tap target artifact, creature, or land.

mc.name: Mind Peel
mc.oracleText:
Buyback {2}{B}{B} (You may pay an additional {2}{B}{B} as you play this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Target player discards a card.
mc.printedText:
Buyback {2}{B}{B} (You may pay an additional {2}{B}{B} when you play this spell. If you do, put it into your hand instead of your graveyard as part of the spell's effect.)
Target player chooses and discards a card.

mc.name: Mindwarper
mc.oracleText:
Mindwarper comes into play with three +1/+1 counters on it.
{2}{B}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Mindwarper: Target player discards a card. Play this ability only any time you could play a sorcery.
mc.printedText:
Mindwarper comes into play with three +1/+1 counters on it.
{2}{B}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Mindwarper: Target player chooses and discards a card. Play this ability as a sorcery.

mc.name: Spined Sliver
mc.oracleText: Whenever a Sliver becomes blocked, that Sliver gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it.
mc.printedText: If any Sliver is blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it.
mc.flavorText:
"Slivers are evil and slivers are sly;
And if you get eaten, then no one will cry."
--Mogg children's rhyme

mc.name: Morgue Thrull
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice Morgue Thrull: Put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice Morgue Thrull: Put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard.
mc.flavorText: It's so hard to find good help these days.

mc.name: Mortuary
mc.oracleText: Whenever a creature is put into your graveyard from play, put that card on top of your library.
mc.printedText: Whenever any creature is put into your graveyard from play, put that creature on top of your library.
mc.flavorText:
"Think of them not as failures but as works in progress."
--Volrath

mc.name: Mox Diamond
mc.oracleText:
As an additional cost to play Mox Diamond, discard a land card.
{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
mc.printedText:
When Mox Diamond comes into play, choose and discard a land card or sacrifice Mox Diamond.
{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Play this ability as a mana source.

mc.name: Mulch
mc.oracleText: Reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all land cards revealed this way into your hand and all other cards revealed this way into your graveyard.
mc.printedText: Reveal the top four cards of your library to all players. Put any of those cards that are lands into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
mc.flavorText: Hope is the one crop that can grow in any climate.

mc.name: Tortured Existence
mc.oracleText: {B}, Discard a creature card: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
mc.printedText: {B}, Choose and discard a creature card: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
mc.flavorText:
"There are terrors lurking in the unseen corners of us all."
--Crovax

mc.name: Nomads en-Kor
mc.oracleText: {0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Nomads en-Kor this turn is dealt to target creature you control instead.
mc.printedText:
{0}: Redirect 1 damage from Nomads
en-Kor to a creature you control.
mc.flavorText: The Kor forsake roots for the winding of the path; forsake voices for the silence of the mind; forsake all else for the poverty of isolation.

mc.name: Victual Sliver
mc.oracleText: All Slivers have "{2}, Sacrifice this permanent: You gain 4 life."
mc.printedText: Each Sliver gains "{2}, Sacrifice this creature: Gain 4 life."
mc.flavorText: "We are kinfolk," explained Karn to the sliver queen. "Just as you need your progeny to complete you, so do I need the pieces of the Legacy to make me whole."

mc.name: Overgrowth
mc.oracleText:
Enchant land (Target a land as you play this. This card comes into play attached to that land.)
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds {G}{G} to his or her mana pool.
mc.printedText: Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, it produces an additional {G}{G}.
mc.flavorText: Life needs no encouragement.

mc.name: Portcullis
mc.oracleText:
Whenever a creature comes into play, if there are two or more other creatures in play, remove that creature from the game.

When Portcullis leaves play, return to play under their owners' control all creatures removed from the game with Portcullis.
mc.printedText: Whenever any creature comes into play, if there are two or more other creatures in play, set that creature aside. If Portcullis leaves play, put the creature into play under its owner's control.

mc.name: Provoke
mc.oracleText:
Untap target creature you don't control. That creature blocks this turn if able.

Draw a card.
mc.printedText:
Untap target creature you do not control. That creature blocks this turn if able.
Draw a card.
mc.flavorText: Mirri did not have time to think, only to react.

mc.name: Pursuit of Knowledge
mc.oracleText:
If you would draw a card, you may put a study counter on Pursuit of Knowledge instead.

Remove three study counters from Pursuit of Knowledge, Sacrifice Pursuit of Knowledge: Draw seven cards.
mc.printedText:
Skip drawing a card: Put a study counter on Pursuit of Knowledge.
Remove three study counters from Pursuit of Knowledge, Sacrifice Pursuit of Knowledge: Draw seven cards.

mc.name: Rabid Rats
mc.oracleText: {T}: Target blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {T}: Target blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Every sentence in Volrath's prisons ends the same way.

mc.name: Ransack
mc.oracleText: Look at the top five cards of target player's library. Put any number of them on the bottom of that library in any order and the rest on top of the library in any order.
mc.printedText: Look at the top five cards of target player's library. Put any number of those cards on the bottom of that library in any order and the rest on top of the library in any order.

mc.name: Rebound
mc.oracleText: Change the target of target spell with a single target if that target is a player. The new target must be a player.
mc.printedText: Target spell, which targets only a single player, targets another player of your choice instead.
mc.flavorText: Insult, like an arrow, is beyond control once loosed.

mc.name: Reins of Power
mc.oracleText: Untap all creatures you control and all creatures target opponent controls. You and that opponent each gain control of all creatures the other controls until end of turn. Those creatures gain haste until end of turn.
mc.printedText: You and target opponent each untap and gain control of all creatures the other controls until end of turn. Those creatures are unaffected by summoning sickness this turn.

mc.name: Revenant
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Revenant's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Revenant has power and toughness each equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.
mc.flavorText:
"Not again."
--Hans

mc.name: Rolling Stones
mc.oracleText: Wall creatures can attack as though they didn't have defender.
mc.printedText: Walls can attack as though they were not Walls.
mc.flavorText: Walls collapse and kill people all the time. Some are just more aggressive about it.

mc.name: Ruination
mc.oracleText: Destroy all nonbasic lands.
mc.printedText: Destroy all nonbasic lands.
mc.flavorText:
"We have built a wall upon sand. The wall will vanish. The sand will remain."
--Oracle en-Vec

mc.name: Sacred Ground
mc.oracleText: Whenever a spell or ability an opponent controls causes a land to be put into your graveyard from play, return that card to play.
mc.printedText: Whenever an effect controlled by any opponent puts a land into your graveyard from play, put that land into play.
mc.flavorText:
"That which knows itself cannot be shaped to another's will."
--Oracle en-Vec

mc.name: Samite Blessing
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "{T}: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to target creature this turn, prevent that damage."
mc.printedText: Enchanted creature gains "{T}: Prevent all damage to any creature from any one source." (Treat further damage from that source normally.)
mc.flavorText:
Knit bone, darn flesh,
Stitch skin, weave breath.
--Samite healing ritual

mc.name: Carnassid
mc.oracleText:
Trample

{1}{G}: Regenerate Carnassid.
mc.printedText:
Trample
{1}{G}: Regenerate Carnassid.
mc.flavorText: The hunter would never forget the time or place where he first met the carnassid, for they buried him there.

mc.name: Seething Anger
mc.oracleText:
Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you play this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Target creature gets +3/+0 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} when you play this spell. If you do, put it into your hand instead of your graveyard as part of the spell's effect.)
Target creature gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

mc.name: Serpent Warrior
mc.oracleText: When Serpent Warrior comes into play, you lose 3 life.
mc.printedText: When Serpent Warrior comes into play, lose 3 life.
mc.flavorText: A hiss before dying.

mc.name: Shaman en-Kor
mc.oracleText:
{0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Shaman en-Kor this turn is dealt to target creature you control instead.
{1}{W}: The next time a source would deal damage to target creature this turn, that damage is dealt to Shaman en-Kor instead.
mc.printedText:
{0}: Redirect 1 damage from Shaman en-Kor to a creature you control.
{1}{W}: Redirect to Shaman en-Kor all damage dealt to any one creature from any one source.

mc.name: Shifting Wall
mc.oracleText:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Shifting Wall comes into play with X +1/+1 counters on it.
mc.printedText:
Shifting Wall counts as a Wall. (Walls cannot attack.)
Shifting Wall comes into play with X +1/+1 counters on it.
mc.flavorText:
"You'd almost think Volrath doesn't want me here."
--Gerrard

mc.name: Sift
mc.oracleText: Draw three cards, then discard a card.
mc.printedText: Draw three cards, then choose and discard a card.
mc.flavorText:
"Twice I have let the Legacy slip away. Never again."
--Karn, silver golem

mc.name: Skyshroud Falcon
mc.oracleText: Flying, vigilance
mc.printedText:
Flying
Attacking does not cause Skyshroud Falcon to tap.
mc.flavorText:
The falcon slits the sky to let the light drip through.
--Kor saying

mc.name: Skeleton Scavengers
mc.oracleText:
Skeleton Scavengers comes into play with a +1/+1 counter on it.
Pay {1} for each +1/+1 counter on Skeleton Scavengers: Regenerate Skeleton Scavengers. When it regenerates this way, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
mc.printedText:
Skeleton Scavengers comes into play with one +1/+1 counter on it.
Pay {1} for each +1/+1 counter on Skeleton Scavengers: Regenerate Skeleton Scavengers and put a +1/+1 counter on it.

mc.name: Skyshroud Archer
mc.oracleText: {T}: Target creature with flying gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {T}: Target creature with flying gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: In Rath, arrows are guided not by virtue but by necessity.

mc.name: Skyshroud Troopers
mc.oracleText: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool. Play this ability as a mana source.
mc.flavorText:
"We were not made for war. Like flowstone, Volrath shaped us to it."
--Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

mc.name: Sliver Queen
mc.oracleText: {2}: Put a 1/1 colorless Sliver token onto the battlefield.
mc.printedText:
Sliver Queen counts as a Sliver.
{2}: Put a Sliver token into play. Treat this token as a 1/1 colorless creature.
mc.flavorText: Her children are ever part of her.

mc.name: Smite
mc.oracleText: Destroy target blocked creature.
mc.printedText: Destroy target blocked creature.
mc.flavorText:
"You've got your childhood wish at last. Now you get to die."
--Gerrard, to Volrath

mc.name: Soltari Champion
mc.oracleText:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
Whenever Soltari Champion attacks, all other creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
If Soltari Champion attacks, all other creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

mc.name: Spirit en-Kor
mc.oracleText:
Flying
{0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Spirit en-Kor this turn is dealt to target creature you control instead.
mc.printedText:
Flying
{0}: Redirect 1 damage from Spirit en-Kor to a creature you control.
mc.flavorText:
Death free throat from thirst, mouth from speech, feet from earth.
--Kor requiem

mc.name: Spike Breeder
mc.oracleText:
Spike Breeder comes into play with three +1/+1 counters on it.
{2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Breeder: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
{2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Breeder: Put a 1/1 green Spike creature token into play.
mc.printedText:
Spike Breeder comes into play with three +1/+1 counters on it.
{2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Breeder: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
{2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Breeder: Put a Spike token into play. Treat this token as a 1/1 green creature.

mc.name: Spike Colony
mc.oracleText:
Spike Colony comes into play with four +1/+1 counters on it.
{2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Colony: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
mc.printedText:
Spike Colony comes into play with four +1/+1 counters on it.
{2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Colony: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

mc.name: Spike Feeder
mc.oracleText:
Spike Feeder comes into play with two +1/+1 counters on it.
{2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Feeder: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Feeder: You gain 2 life.
mc.printedText:
Spike Feeder comes into play with two +1/+1 counters on it.
{2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Feeder: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Feeder: Gain 2 life.

mc.name: Spike Soldier
mc.oracleText:
Spike Soldier comes into play with three +1/+1 counters on it.
{2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Soldier: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Soldier: Spike Soldier gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Spike Soldier comes into play with three +1/+1 counters on it.
{2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Soldier: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Soldier: Spike Soldier gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

mc.name: Spike Worker
mc.oracleText:
Spike Worker comes into play with two +1/+1 counters on it.
{2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Worker: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
mc.printedText:
Spike Worker comes into play with two +1/+1 counters on it.
{2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Worker: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

mc.name: Spindrift Drake
mc.oracleText:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Spindrift Drake unless you pay {U}.
mc.printedText:
Flying
During your upkeep, pay {U} or sacrifice Spindrift Drake.
mc.flavorText: Sea brine for blood, washing foam for laughter.

mc.name: Spined Wurm
mc.flavorText:
"As it moved, the wurm's spines gathered up bits of flowstone, which took the shapes of dead villagers' heads. Each head spoke a single sound, but if taken together, they said, --'Alas for the living.'"
--Dal myth of the wurm

mc.name: Spitting Hydra
mc.oracleText:
Spitting Hydra comes into play with four +1/+1 counters on it.
{1}{R}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spitting Hydra: Spitting Hydra deals 1 damage to target creature.
mc.printedText:
Spitting Hydra comes into play with four +1/+1 counters on it.
{1}{R}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spitting Hydra: Spitting Hydra deals 1 damage to target creature.

mc.name: Stronghold Assassin
mc.oracleText: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Destroy target nonblack creature.
mc.printedText: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Destroy target nonblack creature.
mc.flavorText: The assassin see only throats and hears only heartbeats.

mc.name: Stronghold Taskmaster
mc.oracleText: All other black creatures get -1/-1.
mc.printedText: All other black creatures get -1/-1.
mc.flavorText:
"With the completion of each joyous task, we are closer to Yawgmoth's divine vision."
--Stronghold architect, journal

mc.name: Sword of the Chosen
mc.oracleText: {T}: Target legendary creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {T}: Target legend gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: One shard of Selenia yet remained.

mc.name: Temper
mc.oracleText: Prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn. For each 1 damage prevented this way, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.
mc.printedText: Prevent up to X damage to target creature. For each 1 damage prevented in this way, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.
mc.flavorText:
"I don't need a plan, just a goal. The rest will follow on its own."
--Gerrard

mc.name: Tempting Licid
mc.oracleText:
{G}, {T}: Tempting Licid loses this ability and becomes an Aura enchantment with enchant creature. Attach it to target creature. You may pay {G} to end this effect.
All creatures able to block enchanted creature do so.
mc.printedText: {G}, {T}: Tempting Licid loses ability and becomes a creature enchantment that reads "All creatures able to block enchanted creature do so" instead of a creature. Move Tempting Licid onto target creature. You may pay {G} to end this effect.

mc.name: Thalakos Deceiver
mc.oracleText:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
When Thalakos Deceiver attacks and isn't blocked, you may sacrifice it. If you do, gain control of target creature. (This effect doesn't end at end of turn.)
mc.printedText:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
Sacrifice Thalakos Deceiver: Gain control of target creature permanently. Use this ability only if Thalakos Deceiver is attacking and unblocked.

mc.name: Tidal Surge
mc.oracleText: Tap up to three target creatures without flying.
mc.printedText: Tap up to three target creatures without flying.
mc.flavorText:
"It is nature that gives us our boundaries and nature that enforces them."
--Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

mc.name: Tidal Warrior
mc.oracleText: {T}: Target land becomes an Island until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {T}: Target land is an island until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: The tide of battle favors those who can swim.

mc.name: Torment
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -3/-0.
mc.printedText: Enchanted creature gets -3/-0.
mc.flavorText:
"Volrath has killed me. All that remains of me is the scar"
--Tahngarth

mc.name: Venerable Monk
mc.oracleText: When Venerable Monk comes into play, you gain 2 life.
mc.printedText: When Venerable Monk comes into play, gain 2 life.
mc.flavorText: Age wears the flesh but galvanizes the soul.

mc.name: Verdant Touch
mc.oracleText:
Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you play this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Target land becomes a 2/2 creature that's still a land. (This effect doesn't end at end of turn.)
mc.printedText:
Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} when you play this spell. If you do, put it into your hand instead of your graveyard as part of the spell's effect.)
Target land becomes a 2/2 creature permanently. (This creature still counts as a land.)

mc.name: Volrath's Gardens
mc.oracleText: {2}, Tap an untapped creature you control: You gain 2 life. Play this ability only any time you could play a sorcery.
mc.printedText: {2}, Tap a creature you control: Gain 2 life. Play this ability as a sorcery.
mc.flavorText: "Watch yourself," warned Starke. "These plants aren't nice when they're hungry."

mc.name: Volrath's Laboratory
mc.oracleText:
As Volrath's Laboratory comes into play, choose a color and creature type.

{5}, {T}: Put into play a 2/2 creature token of the chosen color and type.
mc.printedText:
When you play Volrath's Laboratory, choose a color and a creature type.
{5}, {T}: Put a token creature into play. Treat this token as a 2/2 creature of the chosen color and creature type.

mc.name: Volrath's Shapeshifter
mc.oracleText:
As long as Volrath's Shapeshifter is in play and the top card of your graveyard is a creature card, Volrath's Shapeshifter has the full text of that card, and has the text "{2}: Discard a card." (Volrath's Shapeshifter has that card's name, mana cost, color, types, abilities, power and toughness.)
{2}: Discard a card.
mc.printedText:
As long as the top card of your graveyard is a creature card, Volrath's Shapeshifter is a copy of that card, except that Volrath's Shapeshifter retains its abilities.
{2}: Choose and discard a card.

mc.name: Volrath's Stronghold
mc.oracleText:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.

{1}{B}, {T}: Put target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library.
mc.printedText:
{T}: Add one colorless mana to your mana pool.
{1}{B}, {T}: Put target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library.
mc.flavorText: The seed of a world's evil.

mc.name: Walking Dream
mc.oracleText:
Walking Dream is unblockable.

Walking Dream doesn't untap during your untap step if an opponent controls two or more creatures.
mc.printedText:
Walking Dream is unblockable.
Walking Dream does not untap during your untap phase if any opponent controls two or more creatures.
mc.flavorText: Dreams, by definition, live shorter lives than those who dream them.

mc.name: Wall of Blossoms
mc.oracleText:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
When Wall of Blossoms comes into play, draw a card.
mc.printedText:
(Walls cannot attack.)
When Wall of Blossoms comes into play, draw a card.
mc.flavorText: Each flower identical, every leaf and petal disturbingly exact.

mc.name: Wall of Essence
mc.oracleText:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Whenever Wall of Essence is dealt combat damage, you gain that much life.
mc.printedText:
(Walls cannot attack.)
For each 1 combat damage dealt to Wall of Essence, gain 1 life.
mc.flavorText:
The ceiling and the floor fell in love, but only the wall knew.
--Dal saying

mc.name: Wall of Razors
mc.oracleText:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
First strike
mc.printedText:
(Walls cannot attack.)
First strike
mc.flavorText:
"In this blessed structure let the very walls baptize themselves in the blood of intruders."
--Stronghold architect, journal

mc.name: Wall of Souls
mc.oracleText:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Whenever Wall of Souls is dealt combat damage, it deals that much damage to target opponent.
mc.printedText:
(Walls cannot attack.)
Whenever Wall of Souls is dealt combat damage, it deals an equal amount of damage to target opponent.
mc.flavorText:
"It is the nature of evil to turn you against yourself."
--Starke

mc.name: Wall of Tears
mc.oracleText:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Whenever Wall of Tears blocks a creature, return that creature to its owner's hand at end of combat.
mc.printedText:
(Walls cannot attack.)
If Wall of Tears blocks any creatures, return each of those creatures to owner's hand at end of combat.
mc.flavorText:
"Many have been lost to pity."
--Karn, silver golem

mc.name: Warrior Angel
mc.oracleText: Flying, lifelink (Whenever this creature deals damage, you gain that much life.)
mc.printedText:
Flying
For each 1 damage Warrior Angel deals, gain 1 life.
mc.flavorText: She represents not hope, but hope's desperate fury.

mc.name: Warrior en-Kor
mc.oracleText: {0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Warrior en-Kor this turn is dealt to target creature you control instead.
mc.printedText: {0}: Redirect 1 damage from Warrior en-Kor to a creature you control.
mc.flavorText: Only a matter as vital as destroying Volrath could bring together the reclusive Kor people.

mc.name: Youthful Knight
mc.oracleText: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
mc.printedText: First strike
mc.flavorText:
"Let no child be without a sword. We will all fight, for if we fail, we will certainly all die."
--Oracle en-Vec
